mapper.select: select id, user_id, type_id, course_id, question_type, question_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.wrong_question where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, type_id, course_id, question_type, question_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.wrong_question limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yikaodb.wrong_question(user_id, type_id, course_id, question_type, question_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values (#{userId}, #{typeId}, #{courseId}, #{questionType}, #{questionId}, #{answer}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{obj1}, #{obj2})

insert into yikaodb.wrong_question(user_id, type_id, course_id, question_type, question_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.typeId}, #{entity.courseId}, #{entity.questionType}, #{entity.questionId}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})

insert into yikaodb.wrong_question(user_id, type_id, course_id, question_type, question_id, answer, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.typeId}, #{entity.courseId}, #{entity.questionType}, #{entity.questionId}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , type_id = values(type_id) , course_id = values(course_id) , question_type = values(question_type) , question_id = values(question_id) , answer = values(answer) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime) , obj1 = values(obj1) , obj2 = values(obj2)
mapper.update:
update yikaodb.wrong_question
user_id = #{userId},
type_id = #{typeId},
course_id = #{courseId},
question_type = #{questionType},
question_id = #{questionId},
answer = #{answer},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
obj1 = #{obj1},
obj2 = #{obj2},
where id = #{id}
